column4: I installed Ocelot yesterday and i don't see the GRUB before it startup, Grub   did install
if you hold shift at boot, do you see grub then?
if its only Ubuntu then Grub won't show as there isn't really much need, you can use the shift trick if you need recovery mode or an older kernel to boot
if boot time impresses you, try xpud. Boots in 3 seconds here
